card.text: Unique. Pallando specific. Place this card on Pallando if he is in play. Action: If on Pallando, you may tap this card during your end-of-turn phase after resolving hand size to take Gifts As Given Of Old, Wizards Voice, or Eye Of Mandos from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Prophet of Doom
card.text: Unique. Pallando specific. Playable if Pallando is in play and you have at least 12 P and 5 factions in play. Pallando need not be at the appropriate site when making an influence attempt on an opponents resource or character. Such an influence check is modified by half (rounded up) of your unused GI instead of Pallandos EI. The attempt is also modified by subtracting the number of regions between Pallandos site and the where the influence attempt would normally be made. Discard if you have fewer than 5 factions in play.

card.name: Stave of Pallando
card.text: Unique. Pallando specific. Place this card on Pallando if he is in play. Action: If on Pallando, you may tap Stave of Pallando during your end-of-turn phase after resolving hand size to take a faction from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Truths of Doom
card.text: Unique. Pallando specific. Your GI is increased by 6 points. You may only use 2 of these 6 points to control characters.

card.name: Friend of Secret Things
card.text: Unique. Radagast specific. Your companies with a size of 2 or less may play allies at tapped sites.

card.name: Girdle of Radagast
card.text: Unique. Radagast specific. Playable on one of your protected H if Radagast is in play and you have at least 12 P and 6 unique allies and/or unique animal or awakened plant factions in play. The region of the H and all adjacent non-c regions become w.

card.name: Glove of Radagast
card.text: Unique. Radagast specific. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. Any non-unique ally with 1 mind, a copy of which he does not already control, is considered playable with Radagast at his site; the ally may be taken from the discard pile. Non-unique allies may not be duplicated on Radagast.

card.name: Master of Shapes
card.text: Radagast specific. Shapeshifter. Not startable. Only one Shapeshifter card per player may be in play at a given time. Action: You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Place on Radagast if he is in play. If on Radagast, your base GI becomes 25, his skills become Warrior/Ranger, he adopts the base attributes on this card, and his prowess is only modified by -1 if he does not tap while facing a strike.

card.name: Pocketed Robes
card.text: Unique. Radagast specific. Place this card on Radagast if he is in play. Action: If on Radagast, you may tap this card during your end-of-turn phase after resolving hand size to take Crept Along Cleverly, Wizards River-Horses, or Herb-Lore from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Radagast's Black Bird
card.text: Unique. Radagast specific. May be played at Radagasts current site. May be played at a tapped site. This ally may attempt to influence factions as though he were a character. Action: You may cancel a strike this ally is facing, and tap the ally if not already tapped.

card.name: Shifter of Hues
card.text: Radagast specific. Shapeshifter. Not startable. Only one Shapeshifter card per player may be in play at a given time. Action: You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Place on Radagast if he is in play. If on Radagast, your base GI becomes 27, his skills become Diplomat, he adopts the base attributes on this card, he may not move, and your hand size increases by one.

card.name: Winged Change-master
card.text: Radagast specific. Shapeshifter. Not startable. Only one Shapeshifter card per player may be in play at a given time. Action: You may return this card to your hand during the organization phase. Place on Radagast if he is in play. If on Radagast, your base GI becomes 19, his skills become Scout/Diplomat, and he adopts the base attributes on this card. Special Movement: If no other characters or allies except Radagasts Black Bird are in his company, Radagast may declare as his new site any non-Under-deeps site, and hazards may only be keyed to that site during his movement/hazard phase.

card.name: The Forge-master
card.text: Unique. Saruman specific. Playable on an Orc or a Troll. The character requires 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by GI or Saruman. Action: Bearer may tap during the site phase to bring one Technology card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Many-coloured Robes
card.text: Unique. Saruman specific. Place this card on Saruman if he is in play. Action: If on Saruman, you may tap this card during your end-of-turn phase after resolving hand size to take Ringlore, White Light Broken, or First of the Order from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Man of Skill
card.text: Unique. Saruman specific. This card is worth 2 mp for each resource event you have in play which required Information to be played. Such events give no mp in all cases.

card.name: Saruman's Machinery
card.text: Unique. Saruman specific. Playable on a protected H. One Technology item is playable at the site during your site phase whether the site is tapped or untapped. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Saruman's Ring
card.text: Unique. Saruman specific. Place this card on Saruman if he is in play. Action: If on Saruman, you may tap Sarumans Ring during your end-of-turn phase after resolving hand size to take a Ring Item other than The One Ring from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: The White Hand
card.text: Unique. Saruman specific. Playable on Saruman if you have the following in play: at least 12 P, at least 3 factions, A Strident Spawn, and Sarumans Machinery.
